verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:33
verses.text: The fruit of thy land, and all thy labours, shall a nation which thou knowest not eat up; and thou shalt be only oppressed and crushed alway:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:34
verses.text: So that thou shalt be mad for the sight of thine eyes which thou shalt see.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:35
verses.text: The Lord shall smite thee in the knees, and in the legs, with a sore botch that cannot be healed, from the sole of thy foot unto the top of thy head.
